Repertor.text: Send at once by London, Brighton, and South Coast Railway Co.

Repexus.text: Send at once by London, Chatham , and Dover Railway Co.

Repletus.text: Send at once by London and North-Western Railway Co.

Replico.text: Send at once by London and South-Western Railway Co.

Replum.text: Send at once by Midland Railway Co.

Replumbo.text: Send at once by South Eastern Railway Co.

Repono.text: Send at once by special messenger

Reportare.text: Send at once with the goods already on order

Reputabo.text: Send to our order at Railway Station at ---

Reputans.text: Send to our order at Railway Station here

Reputavi.text: Send to our order at wharf here

Resaluto.text: Have sent by Great Eastern Railway Co.

Resarcio.text: Have sent by Great Northern Railway Co.

Resecro.text: Have sent by Great Western Railway Co.
